T02TD3058E:112b-0: @112b * // dpal rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs /
T02TD3058E:112b-1: 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD3058E:112b-2: don med dag la gnod pa'i bya ba rnams spangs te //
T02TD3058E:112b-3: ri bzhin brtan pas rnam dpen sa phyogs song nas ni //
T02TD3058E:112b-4: gnas der bsam gtan khang pa shin tu yid 'thad par //
T02TD3058E:112b-5: 'og gis gzhi shin tu 'thas pa kho na la //
T02TD3058E:112b-6: sa la ma lhung lci ba dri bzang rnams dang ni //
T02TD3058E:112b-7: bsres pas legs byugs gzugs brnyan 'char pa lta bur bya //
T02TD3058E:112b-8: dri zhim me tog dag gis gtor la rgyan rnams bre //
T02TD3058E:112b-9: dkyil 'khor dag tu zhugs shing dam tshig la gnas pa'am //
T02TD3058E:112b-10: so sor thar la gnas pa'am byang chub sems bskyed pas //
T02TD3058E:112b-11: bde ba'i stan la gnas nas bdun po rnam par dag par byas //
T02TD3058E:112b-12: de rjes tshad med bzhi yis bdag blo legs par sbyang //
T02TD3058E:112b-13: sh'u n+ya t'a'i sngags kyis stong pa nyid du bsgom //
T02TD3058E:112b-14: bdag nyid rnam shes ro bo yi ge pam du lta /
T02TD3058E:112b-15: pam de yongs su gyur bas padma 'dab ma brgyad //
T02TD3058E:112b-16: padma'i lte bar aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD3058E:112b-17: de steng pam las nyi ma de steng h'um bsam bya //
T02TD3058E:112b-18: de las rdo rje'i lte bar h'um gis mtshan pa bsam //
T02TD3058E:112b-19: de las 'od 'phros sa gzhir ba gur du gyur //
T02TD3058E:112b-20: rdo rje h'um bcas de las gzhal yas khang pa bskyed //
T02TD3058E:112b-21: de nas rdo rje h'um bcas las //
T02TD3058E:112b-22: bdag nyid rta mgrin skur gyur te //
T02TD3058E:112b-23: dmar po zhal gsum phyag zhabs bzhi //
T02TD3058E:112b-24: dbus dmar g-yas sngo g-yon dkar ba //
T02TD3058E:112b-25: dbus ma'i gtsug nas rta mgo ljang //
T02TD3058E:112b-26: gyen du kha bltas rta skad 'byin //
T02TD3058E:112b-27: dang po rdo rje padma bsnams //
T02TD3058E:112b-28: tha ma gnyis kyis mda' gzhu 'gengs //
T02TD3058E:112b-29: rigs lnga'i bdag nyid dbu la'o //
T02TD3058E:112b-30: dbu skra kham nag gyen du brdzes //
T02TD3058E:112b-31: thod pa'i phreng bas rab tu brgyan //
T02TD3058E:112b-32: yan lag drug la sbrul gyis brgyan //
T02TD3058E:112b-33: sku smad stag gi pags pas g-yogs //
T02TD3058E:112b-34: zhabs bzhi yis ni 'jig rten gyi //
T02TD3058E:112b-35: lha chen bzhi ni rab tu mnan /
T02TD3058E:113a-0: @113a * // me dbung 'bar ba'i dkyil na bzhugs //
T02TD3058E:113a-1: dkyil 'khor gyi ni phyogs bzhir ni //
T02TD3058E:113a-2: shar du rdo rje las byed ma //
T02TD3058E:113a-3: zhal gcig phyag gnyis sngon por bsgom //
T02TD3058E:113a-4: lho ru gshin rje las byed ma //
T02TD3058E:113a-5: zhal gcig phyag gnyis nag mor bsgom //
T02TD3058E:113a-6: nub tu klu yi las byed ma ;
T02TD3058E:113a-7: / zhal gcig phyag gnyis dkar mor bsgom //
T02TD3058E:113a-8: byang du gnod sbyin las byed ma //
T02TD3058E:113a-9: zhal gcig phyag gnyis ser mor bsgom //
T02TD3058E:113a-10: g-yas pa kun la gri gug ste //
T02TD3058E:113a-11: g-yon pa kun la thod khrag bsnams //
T02TD3058E:113a-13: ye shes sems dpa' bkug la gzhug / lha yi 'khor lo bsgom byas la //
T02TD3058E:113a-14: las rnams 'dod na bzlas pa bya //
T02TD3058E:113a-15: aom ha ha hi hi hrim hrim hri hri h'um h'um phat phat //
T02TD3058E:113a-16: bsnyen pa grangs bzhin bzlas nas ni //
T02TD3058E:113a-17: las byed rnams kyi mtshan sngags bzlas //
T02TD3058E:113a-18: badzra sho na sa ma ya /
T02TD3058E:113a-19: ya ma sho na sa ma ya /
T02TD3058E:113a-20: n'a ga sho na sa ma ya /
T02TD3058E:113a-21: kha rag shon sa ma ya //
T02TD3058E:113a-22: rgyal 'gong rgyal tshe la ma sha dom /
T02TD3058E:113a-23: ro la khrag 'thung la snying khrag badzra sa du sa ma ya dza: badzra dza: trig rog ta 'byung po m'a ra ya snying khrag dza: h'um bam ho: badzra aa gu sha dza: 'byung po'i tshe la ma sha dom /
T02TD3058E:113a-26: snying khrag 'byung bo 'byung mo pra ti pri mo'i tshe la ma sha dom /
T02TD3058E:113a-27: ro la khrag 'thung snying khrag ma l'a ma l'a yes yes bhyo bhyo krom krom sv'a h'a /
T02TD3058E:113a-28: aom badzra kro dha ha ya gr'i ba hu lu hu lu h'um phat /
T02TD3058E:113a-29: aom da ki tsa ti bi tsa ti /
T02TD3058E:113a-32: pu ru te pu ru te h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD3058E:113a-33: nya sha sgog btsong spangs pa yi //
T02TD3058E:113a-34: gtor ma lnga'am bzang po dbul ;
T02TD3058E:113a-35: / ji ltar 'dod don gsol ba gdab //
T02TD3058E:113a-36: dpal rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
